Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 22 Clark  buses temp. rerouted due to street blockage at Clark/Catalpa

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Catalpa, due to street blockage near Clark/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Jackson, LaSalle, Monroe and Dearborn, SB: Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Dearborn due to police activity near Jackson/Dearborn.

Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Lasalle, Monroe and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Express #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute near 71st/Jeffery
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Express and 15 Jeffery local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Jeffery Express due to police activity near 71st/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#J14 Jeffery Express and #15 Jeffery local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Jeffery Express due to police activity near 71st/Jeffery.

#J14 Jeffery Express buses will operate via 67th, Stoney Island, 73rd, Jeffery and over regular route

#15 Jeffery Local buses will operate via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
